item.title: By: Billy Bob

item.description: Why yall, how about we make them squael like pigs!?
item.content:encoded: Why yall, how about we make them squael like pigs!?

item.title: By: Witness
item.dc:creator: Witness
item.description:
Not upset at all. I just really hate vnboards. And the people on them. And the people who built them. And the people who paid for them. And the people who manufactured the server hardware. And the people who gave jobs to the people who spawned the inbred fuckwits posting on the boards. And their mailmen.
Fuck.
Where's my rifle?
item.content:encoded:
Not upset at all. I just really hate vnboards. And the people on them. And the people who built them. And the people who paid for them. And the people who manufactured the server hardware. And the people who gave jobs to the people who spawned the inbred fuckwits posting on the boards. And their mailmen.

Fuck.

Where’s my rifle?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Whoa whoa. Put down the rifle. We're all friends here.
Thanks for the clarification, I'll correct that now before anyone gets hurt.
item.content:encoded:
Whoa whoa. Put down the rifle. We’re all friends here.

Thanks for the clarification, I’ll correct that now before anyone gets hurt.

item.title: By: Witness
item.dc:creator: Witness
item.description:
This was originally posted in October 2002 at Massivemultiplayer.org, not fucking VNBoards. The original post (and subsequent frothing from the peanut gallery) can be found at the Wayback Machine:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030207115439/www.massivemultiplayer.org/cnt.php?id=154
